Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/marketing/1797898836606443520/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt " All in one Social post"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/marketing/1797898836606443520/)_"
---
Create a post that will be successful on all social media platforms: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Google Business Profile, and YouTube. I will provide you with the content [PROMPT] of the posts. Make sure to include a hashtag, emojis, and a keyword that is relevant to your post. Keep your post within the character limit for each platform: Facebook (15801.5 Tokens), Twitter (70 Tokens), Instagram (550 Tokens), Pinterest (125 Tokens) LinkedIn (175 Tokens), Google Business Profile (375 Tokens), and YouTube (no character limit). Don't repeat yourself (DRY). Write all output in English. [TARGETLANGUAGE]
PromptHint: Enter your [content] here to get an amazing post that's sure to draw in a crowd!
